name: Everything! (but the kitchen sink)
description:
Controls (different for each mini-game)

    Arrow keys

   Space bar

   Arrow keys + Space bar

   Whole keyboard (case sensitive)

Description

Be the apple that keep the doctor away or kill two bird with one stone. Complete a series of fast-paced mini-game based on real-life popular idioms. Do you have what it takes to find the goal of each game before time runs-up?

Credits
  • A game made by chourouge and Chroute for Game Off 2022
  • Assets adapted from douteigami, ma9ici4n, JDWasabi
  • Music made by Chroute with BeepBox
  • Fonts: Linerama, Designer Notes
  • Classic western cartoon ricochet sound from SmartSound / Zapplat
  • Github repository
  • All donations go to itch.io
